prompt: Create an edit profile page with a vibrant, colorful theme. The profile picture should be a large square with rounded corners at the top center, with a subtle glow effect and a camera icon in the top-right corner. Include input fields for full name, email, phone number, and bio, each with filled backgrounds and rounded corners. Use a gradient background (pink to purple) and orange accents for buttons and focused fields. Arrange the layout in a scrollable column with generous spacing. Include a save button with an orange gradient at the bottom. The app bar should have a matching gradient background and white text.
